targets.query: SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("measure_type" = 'HP' AND "usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Wh") *$price_HP FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Wh")  / $surface_maison /1000 FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND time <=now() and time >=now() -365d GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("kW") *$price_HC FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("W") FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("W") FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(none) tz('America/New York')
SELECT value FROM "consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("kWh") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2023')
SELECT sum("price") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2023')
SELECT sum("price") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2023')

SELECT sum("price") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2022')

SELECT sum("price") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2021')
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2023') GROUP BY "year", "month"
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2022') GROUP BY "year", "month"
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "RETENTION"."consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "year" = '2021') GROUP BY "year", "month"
SELECT sum("W") FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(none) tz('Europe/Paris')
SELECT value FROM "consumption_detail" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
